title: New: Pumarosa – Priestess
content:
Was lucky enough to hear this new track from Pumarosa a little while ago, being blasted through car speakers on the way to one of this summers festivals, and it fit the setting perfectly.

Windows down, driving away from London for a temporary release, I’ve no doubt that Priestess will serve as a similar soundtrack for numerous people next festival season. A sprawling, seven and a half minute psychedelic infused number, it’s completely immersive and intoxicating. Check it out below. Priestess is released by Chess Club on vinyl here.

Follow our Spotify On Repeat playlist for a hand-picked selection of the current hottest tracks.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
